title: Sconce And Socket, early 19th century
description: (A1) circular concave reflector made of tin discs, arranged in red, painted frame under glass; flat piece of tin with nail hold at back. (A2) removable socket in crimped tray which fits into slide-in frame.  (B1) circular concave reflector made of pewter discs and triangles arranged in tin frame (painted red) under glass; flat tin piece at back with nail hole.  (B2) removable candle socket in crimped tray whhich fits into slide-in frame.

tombstone.epitaph: Sconce And Socket, early 19th century. Tin, glass, pewter. 1941-98-72-a,b.
